price: 9. Diggah Nabii Mucammadal ﷺ Qhuraan oobissem Nee, diggah kaa (Qhuraan kinnuk) dacrissam nee tu kaat ossaanaah tu kaak daggoysaanamak.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā al-dhik'ra wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
